 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבָא‎</span>] **verb** ==imbibe, drink largely== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְבָא‎</span> ***id.*** (rare); compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sabû, sesame-wine***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB</sup>; — Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wine***, is probably loan-word and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***import foreign wine*** denominative, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>157 f</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 plural cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְבְּאָה‎</span> [[Isa.56.12|Isa 56:12]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹבֵא‎</span> [[Deut.21.20|Deut 21:20]]; [[Prov.23.21|Prov 23:21]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סובאים‎</span> [[Ezek.23.42|Ezek 23:42]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבָאִים‎</span>, see below); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹבְאֵי‎</span> [[Prov.23.20|Prov 23:20]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבוּאִים‎</span> [[Nah.1.10|Nah 1:10]] — ***imbibe***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁכָר‎</span> [[Isa.56.12|Isa 56:12]] participle active = substantive wine-***bibber, drunkard*** [[Deut.21.20|Deut 21:20]]; [[Prov.23.21|Prov 23:21]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוֺלֵל‎</span>); fully, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹבְאֵי יָיִ֑ן‎</span> [[Prov.23.20|Prov 23:20]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹלֲלֵי בָשָׂר‎</span>); so also [[Ezek.23.42|Ezek 23:42]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] perhaps name of a people, so [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#AV|AV]], see below), which read [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] Sgfr<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Da|Da]]; [[BDB#Co|Co]] thinks dittograph of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּבָאִים‎</span>, but perhaps the reverse (Toy<sup>Hpt</sup> omits <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּבָאִים‎</span>): &gt; [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] (q. v.) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְּבָא‎</span>; other conjectures see in Sm; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּכְסָבְאָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבוּאִים‎</span> [[Nah.1.10|Nah 1:10]] is probably corrupt, passive participle of person dubious, and sense obscure; strike out both as dittograph [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>ZAW xiii (1893), 235</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]]; omitted in translation [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]. On [[Hos.4.18|Hos 4:18]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹבֶא‎</span>. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבָא‎</span>] only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבָאִים‎</span> [[Ezek.23.42|Ezek 23:42]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] = ***drunkards, wine-bibbers*** (?) so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others, but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבָאִים‎</span>.
